get_detailed_fsm_graphviz(graph: graphviz.dot.Digraph) → graphviz.dot.Digraph[source]¶

get_detailed_fsm_graphviz. This function introduce a lot more details in the graph it will introduce also a table for the messages to identify to which message corresponds which id on the edges It will introduce also a table for the states indicating for each id in the state knowledge whcich route is really know

Parameters

graph – dot object of graphviz to modify

Returns

the dot file modified
